#summary The current plan for the upcoming releases.

== Base Assumptions ==
  * Each version fully unit tested
  * Each version fully integration tested
----
= Version 2 =

== 2.0.0 (_In Progress_) ==
  * Update to use Annotations, rather than an integer _keyIndex_, to identify the object that will provide the key.

== 2.1.0 ==
  * Add the ability for the key generation to be done via a referenced bean that adheres to a SSM-specified interface.
